passage.title: Write and e-mail
passage.paragraph: Emily's mother wants to invite her friend to come for dinner next Sunday. Emily's mother is unhappy because she doesn't know how to send e-mail.
"Emily, can you tell me how to send e-mail?" asks Emily's mother.
"No problem," says Emily. "First, start the computer. Then, open the e-mail window."
"Now you can write your e-mail," says Emily.
